TopicTitle: [0.25] Lionhead Aerospace Inc. - Icarus v0.4 updated

Articles.Content: I'm working on .mu files to replace old MultiJoint plugin files. A lot of work incoming, but quality will be there at the end.

So, this might seem like a dumb question, but I honestly couldn't find the answer anywhere...

You can't really use the skycrane to actually lower the rover any more than it sits after you attach the winch, right? Or can you?

So, this might seem like a dumb question, but I honestly couldn't find the answer anywhere...

You can't really use the skycrane to actually lower the rover any more than it sits after you attach the winch, right? Or can you?

No, it justs looks like a cable. It doesn't do that...yet.

Here a quick look on what i'm working on.

The rover will now be composed of only 2 parts (pod and whells) for a easier construction, better performance on low PCs and stop using MultiJoint plugin (too many bugs).

The rover pod is now a .mu file powered by zKreuzung plugin. Right click on the pod and click on deploy will deploy the whole rover (solar panels + cam + antennas).
very good updates.
Looks good, are you reducing the part count on the sky crane too?
When you have already released cruiser Overlord?

When you have already released cruiser Overlord?

I've not yet release the Battlecruiser. I've got few things to fix before. May be I'll release a beta version next week: 3D models and textures are done, need to fix some issues about flight stability.

I'm already thinking/working on new probes (vicking, phoenix) and rovers (Curiosity and Sojourner). And I've got an old interstellar ship project I want to dig out with the 0.17.

Edited October 5, 2012 by Yogui87

Yesterday, I was boring working on my mods next updates, so I decided to start a new project: the MSL Curiosity rover.

This is the result 3D model and animation done:

The biggest part still to do (adapt to cart plugin, make textures).

For now and don't have any name in mind for this Kerbal version of Curiosity. If you got one I'm pretty interested. I've got my ideas about its skycrane and space shell.

I want to make the Sojourner rover too and some probes like Viking or Phoenix, and an interstellar ship.
Can i ask How do i actually Get this rover on the moon, the sky crane in space always falls off when doing the transfer burn , or when entering the moon orbit

The Curiosity rover replica looks fantastic so far!

You'll make NASA proud! Haha.
I agree, the curiosity rover looks sweet. I can't wait
Do you have/need any reference models of Viking? I have a few I won't be using if you'd like me to send them on.
Wow, really nice new projects, I'm a big fan of you works already since the mem 1.0

For the rovername it could be "Necessity" or "Jebedion". xD

Your rovers are great. Prometheus is my standart rover for every new planet.
